name: MAZ! Resurrection
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎

MAZ! is an addictive black hole escape game.

Collect balls, increase your mass, so as not to get into the black hole.
With each new level, the game becomes faster and more difficult.
You won’t have time to relax!

Contains flashes of light and a sharp change of colors!

★  Multiplayer
Play with other players.
Try a different game mode

★  Single player
Relax playing with slow speed and soothing music.
Try the main game mode.

★  Progress
Many different achievements!
Get them for success in the game.
